energyRule.name: 🎲Reckless🎲
energyRule.text: You may reroll all dice but must keep new roll

passive.name: Defensive Utility
passive.text: Gain 1🛡️ when you play a Utility card

weaponPassive.text: Your single target attacks can also hit an enemy between you and the target

basic.desc: Lose up to 3🛡️. Add that much damage to next Attack

advanced.desc: Create 1 wall with 5🪨 HP within 3 range
